name: Makeup Market
description: Makeup Market was fun to create, a little too fun. I spent 3 months making it perfect, and from that I learned that websites will always be a work in progress, and outlining a MVP is important for time-management's sake.

name: Makelist
description: Makelist is a project I made because I wanted a todo list that allowed for making certain items repeatable. If I wanted to make a daily to do list where I had to mark off brushing my teeth and exercising everyday, I did not have to keep adding those back onto the list. My goal was to complete this project in 10 days, and I smashed that goal with a day to spare.

name: Ugly Thingz
description: Ugly Things was made during October, and so my idea was to make a website with a face only a mother could love. And, I do. I love him.
